greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n-1} lcm(k,n-k).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (first 1000 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller)
M. Le Brun, Email to N. J. A. Sloane, Jul 1991
mathematica: Table[ Sum[ LCM[ k, n-k ], {k, 1, n-1} ], {n, 2, 50} ] (* _Olivier Gérard_, Aug 15 1997 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n-1, lcm(k, n-k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 11 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
